nodes.description: 在Dasht-e-Barchi医院袭击后数小时，一名自杀式炸弹袭击者在东部Nangarhar省一名警察的葬礼上杀害了至少32人
nodes.support_text: Within hours of the Dasht-e-Barchi hospital attack, a suicide bomber had killed at least another 32 people attending a policeman's funeral in eastern Nangarhar province.

nodes.description: 在北部巴尔赫省，美国部队的一次空袭导致至少10人死亡，许多人受伤
nodes.support_text: Meanwhile, in northern Balkh province, at least 10 people were killed and many others injured in an air strike by US forces, reports said.

nodes.description: 居民和塔利班声称空袭的受害者都是平民，但国防官员表示所有遇难者都是武装分子
nodes.support_text: Residents and the Taliban claimed the victims were all civilians, but defence officials said all those killed were militants.
Meanwhile, in northern Balkh province, at least 10 people were killed and many others injured in an air strike by US forces, reports said.

edges.support_text: Within hours of the Dasht-e-Barchi hospital attack, a suicide bomber had killed at least another 32 people attending a policeman's funeral in eastern Nangarhar province. Meanwhile, in northern Balkh province, at least 10 people were killed and many others injured in an air strike by US forces, reports said.
